gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: This is the location of the data listings for data sets held at the GLCF.
This is the location from which the Goodes and Latitude/Longitude projections of the 8 km Land Cover data may be downloaded.
This is the Global Land Cover Facility (GLCF) homepage. Other data sets may be viewed and downloaded from this website.
This is the Earth Science Information Partners (ESIP) homepage.
This is the 8 kilometer Global Land Cover Classification Map from the Laboratory of Remote Sensing Studies. A full resolution version of the map may be found at the following
Global land cover classifications at 8km spatial resolution: the use of training data derived from Landsat imagery in decision tree classifiers

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This metadata record is publicly available.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Added ESIP homepage, May 18, 2000. Added LGRSS data center and revised Dr. Townshend's address, May 18, 2000.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The dataset has high uncertainty. I would not recommend this data for land cover research.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: This dataset was not suitable for observation of land cover changes.

gvq:usage.gvq:usageDescription: The dataset was used to observe land and forest cover in Spain.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The data is patchy and therefore unfit for purpose.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: This data is patchy, a lot of land coverage is missing or of very poor quality.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: Overall, this dataset provides good spatial and temporal coverage but the data is of high uncertainty. Metadata record is incomplete.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: Quality and lineage information is not available.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The dataset provides good spatial and temporal coverage. Metadata record is empty.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: Metadata document is incomplete and quality information is not provided which makes it is hard to work with the data.

gvq:usage.gvq:usageDescription: I used this dataset for classification of vegetation cover in Turkey for the year 2011.
